Package presentation

package presentation
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddClientView
    AddClient view is a class that extends JFrame.It will have the role of showing an interface with fields for all the client atributes.
    AddProductView
    AddProduct view is a class that extends JFrame.It will have the role of showing an interface with fields for all the product atributes.
    BillView
    Shows the Bill for the chosen id
    ClientsView
    Interface for showing clients
    Controller
    This is the Controller for the MainWindow with the menu
    MainView
    Main View: It has 3 options:CLIENTS,PRODUCTS,ORDERS press the button of the option wanted to pop a new window with the table desired
    OrdersView
    Graphical Interface for showing the orders
    ProductsView
    GUI for showing Products, it has getters and setters for each part of the GUI
    UpdateClientView
    GUI for updating a Client from the clients table
    UpdateProductsView
    GUI for updating a product from products table
